Deepika Padukone Spills Secrets About Hubby Ranveer Singh, Says He Takes More Time Than Her To Get Ready!
Ranveer Singh and Deepika Padukone are one of the most favourite couples of the tinsel town. Ever since they are married, they both just can’t get enough of each other. Their PDA often makes headlines.
This time, when they appeared together for Femina Beauty Awards 2019, fans couldn’t stop gushing over the love that they share. The lovebirds were honoured with the Beautiful Couple Of The Year award. In addition to that, Deepika also won the Woman of the Year award.
It is at the event that Deepika spilled quite a lot of secrets about Ranveer Singh. In one of the videos doing the rounds, she can be seen saying, “He takes longer in the shower, longer in the loo, longer to get ready, longer to get into bed...”. At this the audiences erupted in laughter, to which she clarified, “I said longer to get into bed.”
